parent.description: Design this redesign is derived from

style.description: Layout filter selected for the site

domain.name: domain
domain.description: CDN to serve the CtA from

bucket.name: bucket
bucket.description: S3 bucket to serve the CtA from

version.name: version
version.description: CtA version to use on site

google.name: google
google.description: Google Analytics ID for the site

facebook.name: facebook
facebook.description: Facebook tracking ID for the site

twitter.name: twitter
twitter.description: Twitter tracking ID for the site

image.name: image
image.description: Default image to use when sharing the website

appId.description: Facebook App ID associated with the site

adult.name: adult
adult.description: Whether the site contains adult content

brandColors.description: The user-selected brand colors for the site

brandStrength.description: How strongly to tend towards brandColors, as opposed to content colors (adaptive)

site_lang.description: Primary site content langauge; ISO 693-1 format

navigation.description: External links to include in site navigation

items.title: Navigation Entry
items.description: Definition of a navigation entry on a website

profiles.description: Social media profile links associated with the site

items.title: Navigation Entry
items.description: Definition of a navigation entry on a website

auto_approve.description: Whether to publish site changes without design review

coverPrefs.name: coverPrefs
coverPrefs.description: Image processing to allow on the site. All default true.

items.title: Site Purpose
items.description: Definition of a purpose for a website, with potential attached action

label.description: Textual label for the site purpose

price.description: A tagged price, in USD cents

items.title: Content block
items.description: Any valid block of content like text, image or video

@type.name: @type
@type.description: Schema.org type the item or block represents

isBasedOnUrl.name: isBasedOnUrl
isBasedOnUrl.description: Source URL for the item or block

permalinkUrl.name: permalinkUrl
permalinkUrl.description: Custom permalink path for the item

starred.description: Indicates if an item should be shown on feed or not

emphasis.description: How much emphasis an item has in some context. For example, we can say if an image has low emphasis (thumbnail, icon) or high emphasis level (a.k.a. "Please, show this image bigger"). Helps to reproduce a client - designer feedback cycle: show the client a layout and he can say if designer should increase emphasis or decrease it. That is why emphasis can be a negative value, in a range from -1.0 to 1.0.

publisher.name: publisher
publisher.description: Original publisher of the item or block

url.name: url
url.description: URL of the publisher's main page

via.name: via
via.description: Publisher the item was discovered via

url.name: url
url.description: Permalink URL the item was on or URL of the publisher's main page

author.name: author
author.description: Authors of the item or block

avatar.description: A cover image that has many details about the media, useful for previews

src.description: ImgFlo URL for the cover image. Caching is generally done by ImgFlo and this URL redirects the consumer to the cached URL. This URL preserves all the queries requested for the ImgFlo image processing graph

original.description: Original URL, no matter if it's a salvaged media or not, this property stores the URL shared/uploaded to TheGrid at the first time

altsrc.description: Alternative URL, if the image has a fullscale URL, the original URL will be stored here

resized.description: URL to image resized by Caliper and used by its preprocess and feature extract workers. In other words, that is the image Caliper really process and extract features from

orientation.description: Cover image orientation based on image ratio. If image ration equals 1:1 then its orientation is square. If image's width is larger than its height then its orientation is landscape. If image's height is larger than its width then its orientation is portrait

rotation.description: Rotation performed by AI using auto-rotate based on EXIF or user preference

unsalvageable.description: Is media unsalvageable a.k.a cannot be rescued on Archive or other mirror?

items.description: Bounding box of a detected face

confidence.description: How much an extracted feature should be considered as a true positive

colors.description: Extracted colors from the image, represented as an array of at least 5 RGB colors

items.description: Tuple of RGB values representing a color

saliency.description: Extracted salient region from an image

confidence.description: How much an extracted feature should be considered as a true positive

polygon.description: Coordinates of a 2D polygon shape (warning: to be deprecated by `polygon`)

items.description: Coordinate in a 2D plane (warning: to be deprecated by `point`)

center.description: Coordinate in a 2D plane (warning: to be deprecated by `point`)

radius.description: Radius of the circle around the salient region (warning: to be deprecated by `regions` radius)

bounding_rect.description: Coordinates of a 2D rectangle shape (warning: to be deprecated by `bbox`)

items.description: Coordinate in a 2D plane (warning: to be deprecated by `point`)
Coordinate in a 2D plane (warning: to be deprecated by `point`)

exif.description: EXIF metadata. A more comprehensive list of available EXIF attributes can be found at http://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/~phil/exiftool/TagNames/EXIF.html

thumbnail.name: thumbnail
thumbnail.description: Information regarding a possibly embedded thumbnail (IFD1)

scene.description: Defines the most important region of an image. It is calculated based on other information like salient or text regions, faces and image dimensions.

lines.description: This measurement/feature/heuristics takes inspiration from the Rule of Thirds, a well known "rule of thumb" in visual composing. Lines are bounding boxes that represent negative spaces as columns or rows around cover's scene. We can overlay content (e.g. text) in space columns or rows around the scene. We also associate a direction to a line, defining the direction we should place content ('horizontal' or 'vertical'). We calculate lines for each image that has scene

stripes.description: Rows or columns representing 3, 2 or 1-stripes around the scene and the scene itself

type.name: type
type.description: A negative space or the scene

lightness.description: For blocks that have Lightness histogram we provide a lightness level as a [0-1] float number. Greater the value, more light is the whole image

saturation.description: For blocks that have Saturation histogram we provide a saturation level as a [0-1] float number. Greater the value, more saturated is the whole image

closest_aspect.description: For blocks that have dimensions, we try to find the closest aspect ratio, considering well known "good" aspects like 2:1, 1:2, 2:3 and so on

transparent.description: For blocks that have Alpha histogram we provide a transparecy level as a [0-1] float number. Greater the value, more transparent is the whole image. Another way to put it is: if `transparent` is greater than zero, it has at least one transparent pixel

coverPrefs.name: coverPrefs
coverPrefs.description: Image processing to allow on the cover. All default true.

dateModified.description: When the entity was last modified

datePublished.description: When the entity was last published

datePublishedOriginal.description: When the entity was originally published
